name: Waifu Souls - Anime Dark Souls
description:
Works good at the weight of 1

This is something I've been meaning to do since long time. What if you could make a model that has dark souls vibe but anime? Well this model aims to be that. I'm sure I could improve but I figured it can be shared in the current state anyways as it's already quite good and fun to play with.
